QuestData.Title: Chill Out, Mon
QuestData.Description: It be as the prophecies said, mon. A $r $c be comin' to set our spirits to rest. We been waitin' for a long time now!$b$bThe Drakkari have become a lost people, fierce and savage.$b$bBut here we suffer by no fault of our own, mon. This place need cleansin' and only the living can do it.$b$bSpeak to me when ya be ready to rejoin your body. Then take the snow from the chest near me here and put my bruddas to sleep.$b$bTake their remnants to your spirit guide. He be knowin' what to do next.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gan'jo wants you to collect the Snow of Eternal Slumber from his chest in the Drakil'jin Ruins.$b$bYou are to use the Snow on the Ancient Drakkari Spirits there and take their Drakkari Spirit Particles back to Kraz at Harkor's Camp.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you completed your task in the crypt, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well.$b$bPlease, sit and listen. There are many things we must discuss.
